content:
Cynthia eats one serving of ice cream every night.  She buys cartons of ice cream with 15 servings of ice cream per carton at a cost of $4.00 per carton.  After 60 days, how much will she spend on ice cream?
Now please strictly answer this question in the json format: "{"reasons": "(a string of your reasoning process)", "answer": "(a pure numeric value without unit)"}"

{"reasons": "Cynthia eats one serving of ice cream every night. She buys cartons of ice cream with 15 servings of ice cream per carton at a cost of $4.00 per carton. After 60 days, she will consume 60 servings of ice cream. Therefore, she will need to buy 60/15 = 4 cartons of ice cream. Each carton costs $4.00, so she will spend 4 * $4.00 = $16.00 on ice cream.", "answer": "16"}

There are 2 groups of people discussing on the same math word question. I will provide you the detailed reasons and answers from your group member and answers from other group members. Use these opinions and your previous answer as additional advice, note that they maybe wrong. Do not copy other's entire answer, modify the part you believe is wrong.
